textBox.richText: Wow, those are a lot of big words. Anyway, this is just a jerry-rigged version of an option to take on and off the Rocket uniform controlled by the player. When I was playing through this games, i wondered why this wasn’t an option and the idea for this immediately came to me. I’d like to see it on some item, as I don’t know about the side-effects it has with the story, so we’ll see. Patch coming soon, regardless of the side-effects, most likely.
